results.idea: Volatility-adjusted short-term momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combined two fields (rsk62_1_return and rsk62_risk_volatility). SUGGESTION2: not applicable (no vector field used). SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: used high userCount fields to catch robust signal. Confidence 0.78 — momentum normalized by volatility is historically stable cross-sectionally.

results.idea: Long-term momentum (5-day vs 60-day) divergence
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used rsk62_5_return and rsk62_1_return to create divergence. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: both fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.72 — divergence between short and long momentum often predicts continuation.

results.idea: Mean-reversion to 20-day factor series average (vector)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used vector field rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val1 with vec_avg. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_avg to average the day's factor elements. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage 1.0). SUGGESTION4: retseries has reasonable userCount. Confidence 0.65 — mean-reversion on factor series moderate.

results.idea: Idiosyncratic return tilt using specific risk inverse
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combined rsk62_1_return with rsk62_1_100_ksrs. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: ksrs has high userCount. Confidence 0.74 — overweighting stocks with low specific risk historically improves Sharpe.

results.idea: Liquidity-conditioned momentum (adv20)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used rsk62_1_return and rsk62_risk_logadv20. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: logadv20 has high userCount. Confidence 0.70 — favor momentum in higher liquidity names to reduce implementation friction.

results.idea: Dividend-stability value signal
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combined rsk62_risk_dividend and rsk62_risk_pb. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: both fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.60 — dividend signal blended with PB offers value/dividend tradeoff.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme zscore
results.description: SUGGESTION1: single field rsk62_1_return used (S1 minimal). SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: very high userCount for returns. Confidence 0.68 — extreme cross-sectional zscores tend to mean-revert short term.

results.idea: Industry momentum relative to market (industry vector avg)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used vec_avg(rsk62_retseries_industry_1_100_val1) and rsk62_1_return to create relative industry momentum. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_avg on industry retseries. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: industry retseries has good userCount. Confidence 0.66 — relative industry strength adds diversification.

results.idea: Volatility breakout filter: momentum * volatility breakout
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combined ts_mean(rsk62_1_return,20) and rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount volatility field. Confidence 0.71 — momentum when volatility spikes can indicate trend start.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by industry beta (backfilled low-coverage beta)

results.idea: Earnings-growth trend vs price momentum

results.idea: Momentum in factor return series (vector avg of factor retseries)
